text: Abo badla iribâ79 abayi kuma (ngoMhla wokuGqibela) ngaphandle kokuma njengomntu obethwa nguShaytân emkhokelela ekuphambukeni, oko kungenxa yokuba bathi: “Ushishino luyafana neribâ,” kodwa uAllâh Ukuvumele ukushishina Wakwalela ukwenziwa kweribâ. Lowo usamkelayo isiyalo seNkosi yakhe, ayeke ukudla iribâ, akayi kohlwaywa ngoko akwenze kwilixa elingaphambili, umcimbi wakhe uya kubonwa nguAllâh; ke lowo ubuyela (kwiribâ), abanjalo ngabahlali baseMlilweni baya kuhlala apho ngonaphakade
